Here you can find the latest version of Sketchy Physics.

[http://code.google.com/p/sketchyphysics/ Home page]

[Docs]

= Installation =
 Unzip into your Sketchup plugins directory.  Directory should look like:
{{{
 Sketchup
  Plugins
    SketchyPhysics.rb
    Win32.so
    SketchyPhysics<dir>
      etc...
}}}
